hero_title: Where creatives connect, collaborate, and thrive.
hero_subtitle: SpheraConnect brings artists, buyers, and curators together with AI-matched opportunities, real-time collaboration, and a global marketplace.
footer_copy: Copyright {year} SpheraConnect. Crafted for creative collaborations.
generic_error_loading: Unable to load data. Please try again.
generic_drag_drop: Drag & drop or click to upload
auth_login_subheading: Pick up your collaborations where you left off. Manage conversations, share new drops, and stay visible on the hub map.
auth_login_stat_connections_caption: Creative connections made between artists and buyers.
auth_login_stat_events_caption: Live events curated for SpheraConnect members this month.
auth_login_card_description: Secure login with email or your preferred provider.
auth_signup_description: Step into a community built for multi-disciplinary creatives.
auth_signup_success: Account created! Jump into your profile setup.
auth_signup_invite_error: Unable to send the profile invite email. Please try again.
auth_signup_invite_sent: We sent a "Create your profile" link to {email}.
auth_signup_invite_help: Check that inbox, then sign in to open the builder from the email button.
auth_signup_highlight_onboarding_body: Import your portfolio, tag your disciplines, and request verification for curated exposure.
auth_signup_highlight_ai_body: Reach producers, curators, and buyers who align with your mediums and interests.
auth_signup_highlight_hubs_body: Check into creative hubs, book studio slots, and stay visible to local collaborators.
hub_subtitle: Explore active hubs and see who is currently checked in. Toggle visibility at any time.
hub_live_creatives_description: Check-ins expire after 4 hours to keep presence data accurate. Encourage your collaborators to opt in for visibility.
hub_nearby_creatives_description: Creators within 100km of your current location.
hub_recent_activity_empty: No check-ins yet. Encourage your collaborators to share their presence to appear on the map.
hub_recent_activity_nearby_empty: No nearby check-ins yet. Try again after enabling location sharing.
hub_manual_select_hint: Working from a coffee shop? Pick the nearest hub so presence and rewards stay accurate.
hub_geo_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.
hub_geo_request_hint: Share your location to spotlight nearby collaborators and auto-fill check-ins.
hub_geo_denied: Location permission denied. Update your browser settings to enable presence.
hub_geo_manual: Location unavailable. Using {hub} hub for your presence.
hub_geo_outside_hub: You must be inside a SpheraConnect hub to toggle presence.
hub_reward_checkin_success: Presence shared. +10 points added to your rewards.
map_missing_token: Configure NEXT_PUBLIC_MAPBOX_TOKEN to render the hub map.
marketplace_seller_tip_one: Upload multiple angles for immersive 3D or mixed-media pieces.
marketplace_seller_tip_two: Enable custom commissions to unlock higher-value collaborations.
marketplace_seller_tip_three: Use tags for mediums and moods so AI matching surfaces your work.
marketplace_subheading: Discover artworks, installations, and custom services from the community.
marketplace_gate_body: Sign in to submit new listings, negotiate offers, and collect curated drops from the community.
marketplace_field_media_helper: Upload an image or paste a URL (JPG/PNG/GIF).
marketplace_upload_error: Unable to upload image. Please try again.
marketplace_upload_fallback: Upload service unavailable. Using a temporary inline image.
marketplace_form_error_required: Please fill in the required fields before publishing.
marketplace_form_error_price: Enter a valid price greater than zero.
marketplace_detail_sold: This piece has already been collected.
marketplace_detail_checkout_hint: Reserve this artwork directly from the artist with SpheraCheckout.

marketplace_error_loading: Unable to load marketplace listings right now.
marketplace_empty: No artworks match this filter yet. Try widening your price range or exploring another tag.
checkout_subtitle: Secure the piece you love in a couple of guided steps.
checkout_payment_copy: Funds are held in escrow until the artist confirms delivery or progress.
checkout_status_ready: Payment intent created. Use the confirm button to simulate a successful charge.
checkout_status_paid: Payment confirmed! We notified the artist and marked the listing as sold.
checkout_login_required: Sign in to complete checkout and receive your receipt.
checkout_error_generic: Unable to process checkout right now. Try again shortly.

marketplace_orders_empty: No orders yet. Complete a checkout to see it appear here.
marketplace_orders_error: Unable to load orders. Retry in a moment.

rewards_actions_help: All updates are logged so finance and ops can review before payouts.
rewards_redeem_description: Convert points into perks or payouts. We record a deduction immediately.
rewards_transfer_description: Move points to external collaborators or keep an audit trail for manual adjustments.
rewards_bonus_description: Reward special contributions without waiting for automations.

rewards_tiers_description: Draft thresholds and benefits, then sync them with your production workspace.
rewards_tier_starter_copy: Basic perks and early access invites.
rewards_tier_partner_copy: Featured placements, concierge support, and member spotlights.
rewards_tier_flagship_copy: Priority drops, co-marketing opportunities, and bespoke insights.
admin_subtitle: Monitor creators, sales, and events across the SpheraConnect ecosystem.
events_subtitle: RSVP to upcoming labs, roundtables, and showcases. Event scaffolding includes moderated submissions and host dashboards.
events_planner_hint: Share a location or virtual link so attendees know where to meet.

events_map_hint: See where residencies and salons are happening across the network.

events_timeline_hint: Tap a stop to preview details and RSVP instantly.
careers_subtitle: Career pathways are integrated with the marketplace roadmap. This scaffold reserves the route for curated placements, studio residencies, and partner briefs.
careers_coming_soon: Coming soon: filterable roles, AI-powered brief pairing, and application tracking dashboards.
matcher_subtitle: Swipe through curated collaborators based on skills, shared tags, and proximity.
matcher_sign_in_prompt: Sign in to test the matching flow.
matcher_swipe_hint: Swipe right to connect and left to skip. Creatives in your current hub surface first.
matcher_no_more: No more creatives nearby. Try refreshing to explore other hubs.

productivity_hero_sprint_title: One kanban, calendar, and automation brain
productivity_hero_sprint_description: Lock creative ops, client services, and product pods into the same ritual. Priorities, blockers, and approvals stay in sync the instant you step inside the app.
productivity_hero_campaign_title: Package your entire campaign story before kickoff
productivity_hero_campaign_description: Demo stakeholder-ready roadmaps with live card previews, role-based sharing, and instant workspace duplication once the project is funded.
productivity_feature_tile_body: Drag instantly, peek todos in a tray, and snapshot every move without leaving the board.
productivity_feature_calendar_body: Auto-group cards and todos by due date with lane heatmaps that warn before anything slips.
productivity_feature_signal_body: Pulse notifications tie back to the exact card view, not just another inbox ping.
productivity_flow_plan_detail: Clone proven templates, drop briefs, and preassign workflows for each collaborator.
productivity_flow_execute_detail: Inline todos and comment digests keep teammates focused in the right column.
productivity_flow_review_detail: Approvers see change diffs, due dates, and blockers without jumping into screenshare hell.
productivity_flow_heading: Preview every sprint step before granting access
productivity_flow_body: Hand clients or execs a living plan view with timelines, assignments, and focus filters. When they approve, invite them into the exact same workspace already staged.
productivity_live_moment_point_snapshots: Snapshot compare + undo for every column
productivity_live_moment_point_heatmap: Priority heat map surfaces blockers early
productivity_insights_heading: Know what is trending before standup
productivity_insights_body: Intelligent due date grouping and focus filters expose overdue blockers directly from the landing page so leadership can course-correct early.
productivity_sync_body: Share this landing view with vendors or clients using temporary tokens. Full edit access only unlocks once they step inside the authenticated workspace.
productivity_automation_presence_body: Know who touched what and roll back with timed snapshots.
productivity_automation_latency_body: Realtime Supabase sync keeps every surface aligned under 150ms.
productivity_automation_roster_body: Auto-invite vendors as viewers, promote once work begins.
productivity_upgrade_heading: Make this landing the new front door to your workspace
productivity_upgrade_body: Showcase the experience, then open the door to the exact same kanban + calendar engine that powers SpheresConnect.
home_flow_network_title: Where creatives connect, collaborate, and ship faster
home_flow_network_description: Introduce SpheresConnect with a glimpse of the verified directory, matcher deck, and hub map before people even log in.
home_flow_ops_title: Run sprints, drops, and events in the same control room
home_flow_ops_description: Productivity boards, events calendar, and rewards automation stay in sync. Stakeholders preview everything from our public landing pages.
home_routes_productivity_copy: Preview kanban + calendar decks without a login.
home_routes_matcher_copy: Swipe a curated deck of creatives before inviting them in.
home_routes_marketplace_copy: Share commerce-ready drops with payment guardrails.
home_routes_profiles_copy: Expose verified portfolios and endorsements safely.
home_routes_messages_copy: Demo your async rituals with a live thread dribble.
home_routes_rewards_copy: Simulate loyalty tiers and automation lanes instantly.

home_marketplace_empty: No marketplace drops have been published yet.
home_launch_title: Every core flow gets a public preview and a gated workspace
home_launch_body: Show prospects the magic at /productivity, /matcher, /hub-map, and more. When they are ready, route them into the authenticated experience with a single click.
admin_landing_title: Oversee every hub, drop, and workflow from one cockpit
admin_landing_description: This landing mirrors the live Admin workspace—triage queues, audit member requests, and monitor marketplace revenue before you ever log in.
admin_mode_trust_description: Queue verification requests, disputes, and moderation decisions in one view.
admin_mode_commerce_description: Track payouts, refunds, and order statuses across all drops in real time.
admin_mode_events_description: Approve programming, talent contracts, and attendance goals every sprint.
admin_org_heading: Hand investors or operators a safe admin preview
admin_org_body: Share this page to prove your house is in order—queues, approvals, payouts, and compliance summaries are all mirrored from the realtime workspace.
admin_org_snapshot_body: When stakeholders need deeper control, invite them into the authenticated workspace. All actions carry over instantly.
admin_footer_heading: Turn this into your diligence link
admin_footer_body: Share the landing, then unlock /admin/workspace once you are ready to collaborate.
admin_insight_dashboards_copy: Pulse charts show member growth, drop revenue, and hub activity.
admin_insight_roleaware_copy: Share read-only oversight views without exposing sensitive data.
admin_insight_actions_copy: Kick off audits, send alerts, and schedule payouts from one queue.
events_landing_title: Sell your calendar before the doors even open
events_landing_description: Offer partners a clear, interactive overview of your programming cadence. Every element mirrors the live events workspace waiting behind the login.
events_stage_ideate_detail: Collect pitches, score them, and auto-build run-of-show.
events_stage_promote_detail: Issue waitlist invites, push SMS reminders, and embed RSVP widgets.
events_stage_recap_detail: Publish highlights, payouts, and attendee analytics instantly.
events_logistics_agenda_copy: Back-to-back scheduling with travel buffers built-in.
events_logistics_badging_copy: Generate NFC badges and QR wristbands directly from the landing.
events_logistics_talent_copy: Brief hosts with scripts, payments, and shared files.
events_spotlight_heading: Highlight programming cadence without a login
events_spotlight_body: Share this living calendar with sponsors, partners, and talent scouts. They see real data—attendance, host readiness, and payout tiers—without needing credentials.
events_stats_body: Auto-generated run of show, vendor list, and tech checks keep every event consistent. When teams need deeper controls they jump straight into the authenticated workspace.
events_footer_heading: Let partners live inside your calendar without credentials
events_footer_body: When it is time to produce, unlock the full events workspace with one invite.
events_preview_reminder: Reminder workflow ready once attendees RSVP.
matcher_landing_title: Show the chemistry before members ever sign in
matcher_landing_description: Drop this landing page in sales materials to prove your matchmaking engine works. Swipe-ready cards, vibe filters, and sentiment stats move even the most skeptical operators.
matcher_story_jamie_quote: Needed a 3D-first stylist in 24h and matched on the first swipe.
matcher_story_marlow_quote: Genkit prompts gave me collaborators that actually get hybrid sets.
matcher_story_isha_quote: Routed investor intros straight from the matcher page as proof of fit.
matcher_benefit_cohorts_copy: Stack members by skills, vibes, or hubs before they ever log in.
matcher_benefit_intros_copy: Auto-suggest DM scripts personalized with context from both sides.
matcher_benefit_refresh_copy: Swipe deck rebuilds nightly based on attendance, sentiment, and pipeline.
matcher_conversion_heading: Use this landing to prove you can curate the right matches
matcher_conversion_body: Stakeholders swipe through living profiles with hover states, badges, and context-rich stats. When they are convinced, the live matcher workspace is one click away.
matcher_stack_fallback: No preview available for this filter.
matcher_preview_heading: Set the tone with a no-login matcher teaser
matcher_preview_body: Keep operators engaged with a living deck, then route them directly to the authenticated swipe room.
profiles_landing_title: Share your member directory without exposing the whole app
profiles_landing_description: Investors and collaborators can explore live profiles, filters, and credentials on this landing page. When it is time to go deeper, route them into the authenticated profiles workspace.
profiles_benefit_filters_body: Stack filters by hub, vibe, or service tier before inviting.
profiles_benefit_intros_body: Generate context cards that plug straight into matcher flows.
profiles_benefit_views_body: Hand investors an auto-refreshing feed without credentials.
profiles_confidence_heading: Let guests see endorsements, stats, and vibes
profiles_confidence_body: Showcase the real directory data, complete with vibe tags and endorsement counts, while the edit controls stay locked down for verified members.
profiles_confidence_badges: Public badges mirror the live app
profiles_confidence_hubs: Hub context pins right to the profile card
profiles_preview_heading: Turn this into the front door for your member roster
profiles_preview_body: Once stakeholders know the value, bring them into the fully authenticated SpheresConnect directory.
profiles_preview_fallback: No preview for this filter yet.
messages_landing_title: Give stakeholders a feel for your inbox rituals without onboarding them
messages_landing_description: Show how threads, reactions, polls, and attachments behave before you ever invite someone into the live chat workspace.
messages_feature_thread_copy: Keep async updates inside one timeline with emoji-level insights.
messages_feature_media_copy: Drop Loom links, WAV files, and polls in the same composer.
messages_feature_presence_copy: Typing states and silent send keep ops tidy in every time zone.
messages_signal_heading: Routes, approvals, and async rituals preview here
messages_signal_body: Let guests explore sample threads, polls, and audio recaps—the same UI they will use once invited to the authenticated inbox.
messages_signal_huddles: Spin up huddles directly from threads
messages_stat_note: Once they’re ready for the high-fidelity experience, route them to the real-time workspace.
messages_preview_heading: Share this link to prove your comms game
messages_preview_body: No login required until they want the full control center of SpheresConnect Messages.
messages_chat_text_1: Deck updates pushed. Need a quick read?
messages_chat_text_2: Looping in the sound team. Uploading refs now.
messages_chat_text_3: Attaching stems + updated mix. Ready for notes.
marketplace_landing_title: Put every curated drop on a shareable landing
marketplace_landing_description: Showcase digital and physical inventory, price logic, and fulfillment guardrails before granting sellers access to the live marketplace console.
marketplace_logistics_checkout_copy: Stripe-native checkout flows branded to your hub aesthetic.
marketplace_logistics_split_copy: Creator, curator, and hub splits run automatically.
marketplace_logistics_inventory_copy: Realtime counts keep drops scarce but fair across audiences.
marketplace_merch_heading: Win trust before the first cart goes live
marketplace_merch_body: The landing walks through payouts, security holds, and product tiers so your marketplace looks buttoned up even before launch.
marketplace_marquee_body: Pin top creators, show payout splits, and display waitlists before they enter the live dashboard.
marketplace_preview_heading: Turn this link into your marketplace teaser
marketplace_preview_body: When sellers want the deeper tooling, route them straight into the fully authenticated workspace.
help_center_landing_title: Coordinate urgent help without leaving the marketplace
help_center_landing_description: Request triage, helper verification, and moderation logs all live next to your core commerce stack.
help_center_feature_requests_copy: Spin up safety, logistics, or advocacy asks in seconds.
help_center_feature_messaging_copy: Threaded DMs, offers, and polls stay with each request.
help_center_feature_moderation_copy: Ratings, verification, and audit logs mirror the live tool.
help_center_preview_heading: Preview the helper workflow before granting access
help_center_preview_body: Show stakeholders the exact screening, matching, and follow-up experience.
help_center_preview_item_one: Route urgent categories with SLA tags
help_center_preview_item_three: Launch DMs without exposing private inboxes
help_center_guardrail_heading: Guardrails mirror the live control room
help_center_guardrail_body: Keep compliance, background reviews, and incident notes visible before onboarding.
help_center_marquee_body: Surface verified helpers, escalation contacts, and sponsor partners before inviting them in.
help_center_preview_footer_heading: Share this link to prove your response plan
help_center_preview_footer_body: When teams are ready, they jump straight into the authenticated help center workspace.
help_workspace_subtitle: Coordinate urgent help requests, surface trusted helpers, and keep moderation + verification logs alongside the core marketplace.
help_request_create_description: Publish rapid-response requests without touching the existing marketplace flow.
help_helper_directory_description: All helper-only profiles live alongside existing artists without breaking user flows.
help_chats_empty: No chats in this thread yet.
help_verification_description: Lightweight vetting for helper identities, separate from artist verification.
help_moderation_description: Audit helper activity without touching the existing global moderation queue.
policies_landing_title: Policies and security that protect every release
policies_landing_description: SpheraConnect combines clear app listing policies with layered security controls so teams can ship confidently.
policies_listing_panel_heading: Every listing follows a single, transparent policy set.
policies_listing_panel_body: Before experiences go live, they are checked against eligibility, content, and safety requirements designed for creative networks.
policies_listing_panel_point_one: Clear rules for what can be listed, promoted, and sold.
policies_listing_panel_point_two: Review flows that surface risky behavior before it reaches users.
policies_listing_panel_point_three: Appeal paths so teams can correct issues without losing momentum.
policies_listing_review_copy: Each experience flows through a consistent review process with automated checks and human review for edge cases.
policies_listing_conduct_copy: Creators, buyers, and admins share a single code of conduct covering harassment, spam, and misuse of collaboration tools.
policies_listing_enforcement_copy: From soft warnings to suspensions, enforcement actions ladder up with clear communication and audit history.
policies_security_heading: Multiple layers of defense, not just one switch
policies_security_body: Security is built into authentication, data handling, and runtime operations so that a single misconfiguration cannot compromise the whole system.
policies_security_auth_copy: Scoped access tokens, session timeouts, and role-based permissions separate guest trials, collaborators, and admin teams.
policies_security_defense_copy: Encryption in transit and at rest, least-privilege database roles, and isolated workspaces protect creative and financial data.
policies_security_observability_copy: Structured logs and alerts surface unusual behavior quickly so teams can respond with targeted, reversible controls.
policies_audience_users_body: You can trust that listed experiences meet baseline safety, moderation, and data handling expectations before you ever click "Join".
policies_audience_devs_body: You get stable, documented rules and security guarantees so new releases do not break compliance every time you ship.
